arctic.description: Looping similar to Burbenog for Ground monsters, with larger loops (and thus a longer-than-normal path) for Air.

desert.description: The classic looping path style of Burbenog, with less looping for Air monsters.

temperate.description: A long, semi-fractal path for Ground monsters, with a straight back-and-forth one for Air.

plant_growth.description: The tower grows by 20% in size and 10% in damage for each stack.

invisible.description: Cannot be directly targeted unless revealed by a tower or debuff.

aoe_purge.description: Periodically purges all nearby monsters of all debuffs

full_self_purge.description: Periodically purges all debuffs from itself

random_self_purge.description: Periodically purges a random debuff from itself

minor_armor.description: Reduces physical damage taken by 30%. Stacks additively with other physical damage taken modifiers.

normal_armor.description: Reduces physical damage taken by 60%. Stacks additively with other physical damage taken modifiers.

major_armor.description: Reduces physical damage taken by 90%. Stacks additively with other physical damage taken modifiers.

minor_armor_piercing.description: Counterracts 25% of physical damage reduction for 6 seconds

normal_armor_piercing.description: Counterracts 50% of physical damage reduction for 6 seconds

major_armor_piercing.description: Counterracts 75% of physical damage reduction for 6 seconds

major_burning.description: Burns for 25 magical damage per stack every second for 3 seconds. Stacks to 999.

minor_burning.description: Burns for 1 magical damage per stack every second for 3 seconds. Stacks to 999.

normal_burning.description: Burns for 5 magical damage per stack every second for 3 seconds. Stacks to 999.

major_healing.description: Heals for 10% of max HP every second

minor_healing.description: Heals for 1% of max HP every second

normal_healing.description: Heals for 3% of max HP every second

minor_magic_armor.description: Reduces magical damage taken by 30%. Stacks additively with other magical damage taken modifiers.

normal_magic_armor.description: Reduces magical damage taken by 60%. Stacks additively with other magical damage taken modifiers.

major_magic_armor.description: Reduces magical damage taken by 90%. Stacks additively with other magical damage taken modifiers.

minor_magic_armor_piercing.description: Counterracts 25% of magical damage reduction for 6 seconds

normal_magic_armor_piercing.description: Counterracts 50% of magical damage reduction for 6 seconds

major_magic_armor_piercing.description: Counterracts 75% of magical damage reduction for 6 seconds

minor_poison.description: Slows by 5%, increases physical damage taken by 5%, and causes 3 non-lethal magical damage every 3 seconds for 3 seconds. Reapplication adds duration.

normal_poison.description: Slows by 10%, increases physical damage taken by 10%, and causes 15 non-lethal magical damage every 3 seconds for 3 seconds. Reapplication adds duration.

major_poison.description: Slows by 15%, increases physical damage taken by 15%, and causes 75 non-lethal magical damage every 3 seconds for 3 seconds. Reapplication adds duration.

minor_slow.description: Slows movement by 15% for 6 seconds. Stacks multiplicatively with other movement speed modifiers.

normal_slow.description: Slows movement by 25% for 6 seconds. Stacks multiplicatively with other movement speed modifiers.

major_slow.description: Slows movement by 35% for 6 seconds. Stacks multiplicatively with other movement speed modifiers.

minor_wound.description: Reduces healing by 40% for 6 seconds. Stacks multiplicatively with other healing modifiers.

normal_wound.description: Reduces healing by 60% for 6 seconds. Stacks multiplicatively with other healing modifiers.

major_wound.description: Reduces healing by 80% for 6 seconds. Stacks multiplicatively with other healing modifiers.

gold_mining.description: Grants the displayed amount of gold at the end of the round.

wood_investment.description: Grants the displayed amount of wood when harvested.

freeze.description: Stunned for 2 seconds (diminishing returns with other stun effects)

ministun.description: Very briefly stunned (diminishing returns with other stun effects)

root.description: Immobilized for 2 seconds (diminishing returns with other immobilize effects)

vortex.description: Immobilized for 2 seconds (diminishing returns with other immobilize effects)

fire.description: Towers that reveal invisible enemies and do overwhelming magical damage primarily through stacking damage-over-time debuffs.

air.description: Towers that excel at fighting flying and invisible enemies, have strong single-target physical and pure damage, and buff nearby towers.

earth.description: Towers that excel in physical damage against multiple ground enemy targets, but are incapable of attacking flying enemies.

water.description: Towers that do less (and exclusively magical) damage, but with powerful slowing debuffs that can greatly enable multi-targeting towers.

plant.quote: We've got to have farming in the game. Obviously.
plant.description: Towers that grow over time, becoming more powerful. A solid mix of physical direct damage and magical damage over time.

sell_full.description: A nice, pristine, unused tower. You can get full value back... for now.

sell_less.description: You waited too long! Inflation! Depreciation! This tower is garbage now.

harvest_wood_investment.description: Destroys the tree, yielding wood as shown in the Wood Investment buff.

upgrade_tower_damage.description: [This tooltip will get replaced by a dynamic one.]

upgrade_tower_utility.description: [This tooltip will get replaced by a dynamic one.]

lowest_health.description: Prioritize attacking the target with the lowest remaining health.

highest_health.description: Prioritize attacking the target with the highest remaining health.

closest_to_tower.description: Prioritize attacking the target closest to this tower.

closest_to_start.description: Prioritize attacking the target closest to the start of the path.

closest_to_end.description: Prioritize attacking the target closest to the end of the path.

shortest_debuff_time.description: Prioritize attacking the target with the shortest total weighted time remaining on debuffs this tower can inflict.

highest_debuff_stack.description: Prioritize attacking the target with the highest number of stacks of debuffs this tower can inflict.

most_targets.description: Prioritize attacking the target with the most nearby targets in range for AOE damage.

target_type.description: Prioritize attacking the target with the most matching monster types.

blizzard.description: Towers have slightly increased attack cooldowns and slightly reduced accuracy.

desert_cloudy.description: Towers have slightly reduced attack cooldowns.

sandy_day.description: Monsters have slightly reduced armor, but Towers have slightly reduced accuracy.

snow.description: Towers have slightly increased attack cooldowns.

snow_sunny.description: Towers have slightly increased attack cooldowns, but Monsters have slightly reduced movement speed.

sunny.description: Weather so boring it's completely neutral.

windy.description: Monsters have slightly increased movement speed.

alligator.description: A ground monster with a lot more health than normal. Normally only four of these spawn in a wave.

bitsy_ant.description: A fast ground monster with very little health. There might be a lot of these!

beetle.description: A ground monster with a little more health than normal and spawns Ants when killed.

boar.description: The regular, quintessential monster to which all other monsters are compared. It has a little bit of base armor.

entling.description: A ground monster with less health and slightly slower movement.

entling_mage.description: A ground monster with more health and slower movement that periodically summons smaller monsters.

goblin_wolf.description: A ground monster with a little less health but a lot more base magical armor.

little_stone_golem.description: A ground monster with a little less health but a lot more base physical armor.

zilla.description: A ground monster with a lot more health than Boss monsters. Good thing you only have to fight one of these at a time!

duckduck.description: An air monster with more health than normal. Normally only four of these spawn in a wave.

poyo.description: The basic air monster that has less health than a normal ground monster.

artillery_shell.description: It goes out like a cannonball.

turnip_bullet.description: For some reason, all plants shoot turnips.

water_ball.description: H2Oh no, you're reading this description!

weapon.description: Simple plinking poison attack

earthbud_plant.description: Moderate damage and inflicts normal wound in small AOE

weapon.description: Moderate AOE damage that also applies normal wound

weapon_damage.description: Also applies normal poison

weapon_utility.description: Also targets Air

foxlily_plant.description: Inflicts normal poison, targets ground and air

weapon.description: Well-rounded poison tower

weapon_damage.description: Attacks 3 times

weapon_utility.description: Lower damage, but attacks 3 targets

gold_mine.description: Gives decreasing gold at the end of each round. Pays off in 4 waves.

sugarbell_plant.description: Moderate damage, a quick attack, inflicts minor poison

weapon.description: Moderate damage, a quick attack, inflicts minor poison

spore_spreader.description: Launches slow-traveling projectiles that explode with poison

weapon.description: Launches slow-traveling projectiles that explode with poison

weapon_damage.description: Applies major poison instead

weapon_utility.description: Reduces damage, but increases splash range

sunflower_plant.description: Spits its seed at up to 5 targets at once, inflicting major poison

weapon.description: Multi-target, major poison

weapon_damage.description: Triples damage and reduces cooldown by 25%

weapon_utility.description: Also targets Air

small_turret.description: It's a small turret! What do you want?

tree_of_everlasting_wood.description: Can be harvested for more wood every wave. Auto-harvest at full growth.

water_101.description: Low damage, but cheap, fast attack, inflicts minor slow.

weapon.description: Low damage, but applies minor slow

water_102.description: Moderate damage, targets ground and air.

weapon.description: Decent damage, attacks ground and air, but doesn't slow

water_103.description: Attacks two targets and inflicts minor slow.

weapon.description: Good damage, attacks 2 targets, applies minor slow
Long cooldown, essentially same ability as Dota

weapon_damage.description: Damage increases by 30% per bounce

weapon_utility.description: Shorter cooldown, faster travel time, longer bounce range, lower damage, slows in range 1 AOE

weapon.description: Single target damage, aoe slow

weapon_damage.description: Does full damage in AOE but with slightly smaller AOE range

weapon_utility.description: AOE affects ground and air and slightly larger AOE range

hypothermia.description: Moderate damage and applies normal wound

weapon.description: Moderate damage and applies normal wound

weapon_damage.description: Applies minor wound and major wound instead

weapon_utility.description: Also applies major slow

heart_of_ice.description: Fast attack that applies major slow and a chance of freezing

weapon.description: Fast attack with good damage that applies major slow and has a 50% chance of freezing

weapon_damage.description: Attacks 2 targets and has 100% chance of freezing

weapon_utility.description: Also applies mortal wound

weapon.description: High damage but only attacks air

air_102.description: Slow, moderate attacks on air and ground

weapon.description: Moderate damage, attacks ground and air

air_103.description: Reduces cooldown times of all nearby towers

weapon.description: Doesn't attack but reduces the cooldowns of nearby towers by 10%

duster.description: Passively reveals invisible monsters in full attack region

weapon.description: Passively reveals invisible monsters in full attack region

weapon_damage.description: Also applies normal armor piercing in passive aoe

weapon_utility.description: Also applies targeted ministuns

weapon.description: Pure damage that attacks both air and ground

weapon_damage.description: Performs 2 attacks per cooldown

weapon_utility.description: Also applies major armor piercing

vortex.description: Moderate attack that immobilizes an air target

weapon.description: Moderate attack that immobilizes an air target

weapon_damage.description: Significantly increases damage

weapon_utility.description: Immobilizes in small aoe

weapon.description: Doesn't attack but reduces the cooldowns of nearby towers by 25%

weapon_damage.description: Increases range and deals percentage-based damage to air targets

weapon_utility.description: Also increases damage of nearby towers by 10%

weapon.description: Applies low level burning debuff

flare.description: Very low damage, applies medium duration reveal debuff to targets

weapon.description: Moderate damage, applies short duration reveal debuff to targets

fire_103.description: Very quickly applies 3 stacks of minor burning to 2 targets

weapon.description: Very quickly applies 3 stacks of minor burning to 2 targets

sunburst.description: Passively reveals in full range and further reveals attacked targets

weapon.description: Passively reveals in full range and applies normal reveal to attacked targets

weapon_damage.description: Also applies normal burning and attacks 3 times

weapon_utility.description: Reduces cooldown, attacks 2 targets, and permanently reveals attacked targets

fire_plume.description: Narrow aoe attack that applies normal burning

weapon.description: Narrow AOE attack that applies normal burning

weapon_damage.description: +1 splash range

weapon_utility.description: Also applies normal armor piercing

burning_lash.description: Moderate damage and quickly applies normal burning

weapon.description: Moderate damage and quickly applies normal burning

weapon_damage.description: Applies major burning instead and reduces cooldown

weapon_utility.description: Reduces initial damage, but attacks 2 targets and hits 3 times

laserbeam.description: Fires a beam that periodically deals damage and inflicts major burning.

weapon.description: Fires a long-range laserbeam that quickly burns a target

weapon_damage.description: Also hits all targets in the beam's path

weapon_utility.description: Also targets Air and attacks 2 targets

earth_pounder.description: Cheap and hard-hitting, Earth's bread and butter

weapon.description: Cheap and hard-hitting, Earth's bread and butter

scattershot.description: Shoots up to 3 targets at once for moderate damage

weapon.description: Shoots up to 3 targets at once for moderate damage

crusher.description: Slow attack, good single-target damage, wounds

weapon.description: Slow attack, good single-target damage, wounds

weapon_damage.description: Hits in small aoe

weapon_utility.description: Also applies normal magic armor piercing

cannonball_gun.description: Shoots a cannonball that hits every target it moves through

weapon.description: Shoots a cannonball that hits every target it moves through

weapon_damage.description: Improves attack and projectile speeds

weapon_utility.description: Also applies minor magic armor piercing and minor slow

weapon.description: Moderate multi-targeted AOE damage

weapon_damage.description: Also applies major magic armor piercing

weapon_utility.description: Also immobilizes

weapon.description: Deals percentage-based AOE damage to all targets in range

weapon_damage.description: Doubles splash range.

weapon_utility.description: Also ministuns all targets

weapon.description: Moderate damage, wounds and slows

weapon_damage.description: More than doubles damage

weapon_utility.description: Only 2 attacks, but a shorter cooldown, and also applies normal poison

fog_machine.description: Low damage, passively reveals, slows, and pierces armor in full range

weapon.description: Low AOE damage that applies minor armor piercing, minor slow, and passively reveals in full range

weapon_damage.description: Also applies normal armor piercing and increases damage

weapon_utility.description: Also applies normal slow

blizzard.description: Moderate damage, applies heavy slow debuff in narrow AOE

weapon.description: Moderate AOE damage, applies major slow debuff

weapon_damage.description: Significantly increases damage

weapon_utility.description: Reduces damage, but increases splash range

lightning_bolt.description: High single-target damage, reveals target and nearby enemies

weapon.description: High single-target damage; this tower can see invisible monsters, and its attack reveals the target and nearby enemies for a couple seconds

weapon_damage.description: Also applies 2 stacks of minor burning in AOE

weapon_utility.description: Applies normal reveal instead, and in a larger area

arc_lightning.description: Chain lightning bounces reduced damage to successive targets

weapon.description: Hits a target in a short range, then bounces to a new target 4 times, applying normal burning and dealing less damage each bounce

weapon_damage.description: Increases secondary targeting range and number of bounces, and reduces damage reduction for successive hits

weapon_utility.description: Also applies major magic armor piercing

fire_grenade.description: Launches a burning projectile that causes a mass secondary attack

weapon.description: Launches a projectile that causes a mass secondary projectile attack with lower damage, and all apply burning

weapon_damage.description: Increases base damage, blast range, number of secondary targets hit, and secondary damage multiplier

weapon_utility.description: Also ministuns all targets

magma_pools.description: Creates a pool of magma that burns any enemies walking through it

weapon.description: Its attack creates a pool of magma on the ground that inflicts major burning

weapon_damage.description: Inflicts damage every tick and also applies major magic armor piercing

weapon_utility.description: Also immobilizes monsters when they first enter a magma pool

stone_vine.description: Slow attack, high damage plus debuffs

weapon.description: Slow attack, high damage, applies major wound and normal slow

weapon_damage.description: Significantly higher and pure damage

weapon_utility.description: Slightly lower damage, but +2 range and lower cooldown

boygrove.description: Hoping to grow up to be a real mangrove

weapon.description: Inflicts minor poison and minor slow, targets ground and air

weapon_damage.description: Additionally applies normal poison and hits harder

weapon_utility.description: Additionally applies normal slow and attacks 2 targets

mangrove.description: Grows long-lasting roots that damage and slow all monsters entering them

weapon.description: Each attack grows roots in that place that last for a while; only does damage and inflicts major slow and minor poison through the roots

weapon_damage.description: Roots also apply major poison

weapon_utility.description: Also immobilizes

magma_pool.description: Inflicts damage and burning on monsters that walk through it.

mangrove_roots.description: Inflicts physical damage and greatly slows monsters that walk through it.

abundant_ore.description: The Earth Kingdom can build Gold Mines here.

fertile_dirt.description: The Plant Kingdom can build Trees of Everlasting Wood here.

give_gold.100_description: Give yourself 100 gold, you big cheater.
give_gold.1000_description: Give yourself 1000 gold, you big, gluttonous cheater.

reference_menu.description: Open a window with reference information for all the icons, buffs, etc. in the game.

resourceDisplay.title: Resources
resourceDisplay.donate_tooltip: Donating removes it from your supply and adds it to the common pool so any player can use it. cannot be donated.

buffs.title: Buffs
buffs.description: All relevant buffs in the game, organized by category. Hover over them to see more information.

icons.title: Other Icons
icons.description: Other icons used by the game, along with their descriptions.

range.circle: A circular region centered on the tower, extending out the specified number of voxels from the 1x1 region of the tower.
range.rectangle: A rectangular region, usually positioned at the edge of the tower, with the specified width and length.
range.square: A square region centered on the location of an attack, with the specified width/length.

damage.physical: Physical damage, mitigated by armor and increased by poison debuffs.
damage.magical: Magical damage, mitigated by magic armor.
damage.pure: Pure damage, does not get mitigated.

invis.sees: This tower can see and attack invisible monsters.
invis.reveals: This tower reveals all invisible monsters while they are in its range.

gameStateWindow.title: Game State
gameStateWindow.remaining_monsters_tooltip: Click to show Spawned Monsters view
gameStateWindow.wave_tooltip: Click to show list of waves
gameStateWindow.player_health_tooltip: If this drops to 0, you lose. Every monster that escapes will reduce it by at least 1 (some monsters, like bosses, reduce it by more).

stickyTargeting.description: After selecting a target, continue attacking that target until it dies or moves out of range before finding a new target.

tower_weapons.passthrough_attack: Attacks hit all enemies passed through

select_game_story.title: Choose your adventure
select_game_story.game_mode_select_start: , a location that is sure to be

normal.description: Towers cost a normal amount of gold, and there are a mix of weather effects.

peaceful.description: Towers cost less gold, there are fewer waves, and there are only neutral or positive weather effects.

hard.description: Towers cost more gold, there are extra advanced waves, and there are only neutral or negative weather effecs.

title.incompatible:
SH:TD Incompatible Mods

The following mods may be incompatible with SH:TD. Any that are not merely building templates or recipes may need to be disabled for SH:TD to function properly.

build.missing_resources: Missing resources to build this tower

upgrade.missing_resources: Missing resources to upgrade this tower
